projectsData.title: To Do List with Drag and Drop
projectsData.description: Project of a list with drag and drop connected to the MongoDB database. With functionalities to rearrange the list, edit and delete tasks.

projectsData.title: Ordering Platform for an Italian Pizzeria
projectsData.description: Delivery site, with possibility of login and registration with google Oauth, payment management with Stripe. With administrative area, where to control users, orders and menu.

Profile.title: Profile
Profile.text: During this year, I dedicated myself completely to learning website development and now I am seeking the opportunity to start my career in this field.
